title: Bharatpe | SDE-2 | Gurgaon
content:
Below are the offer details: -

Education: B.Tech. from Tier 3 College
Years of Experience: 2 year 4 months
Prior Experience: Product based Company
Date of the Offer: 17th Oct, 2023
Company: Bharatpe
Title/Level: SDE-2
Location: Gurgaon
Salary: 18.5 LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: Relocation benifits(travelling tickets booked by the company itself) + 15 days hotel reimbursement 
Stock bonus: 17-18 LPA (Vested over 4 Years)
Bonus: 1.5 LPA Joining Bonus
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 18.5LPA + 1.5 LPA + 4.25 LPA = 24.25 LPA( for first Year)
salaryTotal: : 18.5lpa + 1.5 Lpa + 4.25 Lpa = 24.25 Lpa( For First Year)
